column4: This has never happend to me (the errors).  I made a new Ubuntu CD with Ubuntu 7.10, and I burned the iso to the disk, and then I used it.  I checked for defects, it said that it found one error in one file.  I decided that the shouldn't too much of a problem, so then I choosed the menu item "Try/Install Ubuntu."  After the first progress passing, it switched the second progress bar.  The second progress bar was stuck arround the beginning, but out a little
I can make another disk if I need too.
it told you it was damaged
